title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 372.1 - EAF-general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 372.1 - EAF-general

State Regulations

Emergency assistance (EAF) means all aid, care and
services granted under this Part to families with children, including migrant
workers, to deal with crisis situations threatening the family and to meet
urgent needs resulting from a sudden occurrence or set of circumstances
demanding immediate attention. Such assistance may be furnished if and for so
long as Federal funds are available. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
372.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
